long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Abstract Summary is a productivity tool to empower users "Taste Before Reading". "Taste Before Reading" inspired by the Supermarket Tasting program. The user could spend 1/3 or 1/4 time to decide whether they are interested in the specific subject and would like to keep reading for detailed information. With Abstract Summary, you can read 3~4 times more information in the same time period and never miss any important or interesting things. The Abstract Summary productivity tool leverages the AI technology generating summary of each webpage you want to read (under your request). 

The Abstract Summary community enables the users to summarize and share the summary within the community. The Chrome Extension is also the tool for everyone to contribute the summary (not the original article and information). The other users could benefit from your contribution to accelerate the summarization or browser the existing summaries.

As an AI driven summarization tool, it may not reflect the fully intention of the author or misunderstand the information that the author wants to express. We strong encourage everyone to read the original article for comprehensive understanding if you are interested in this summarized topic!

How it works:
1. Install the Chrome Extension from the Chrome Store
2. Browse any webpage you love. 
3. Click the Abstract Summary icon on the tool bar.
4. If someone has generated the summary before, you will see the lucky message and open the summary page automatically in new tab without additional actions or sending any information to backend.
5. If you are the first one to generate summary for this page, you need explicitly approve the information sending request. Without your consent, we don't grab any information from you.
6. After the summary is generated in backend, you will be navigated to the summary page automatically.
7. Enjoy the summary. If you are interested in the subject, you can click the link at the bottom to read the original article.

FAQ:
1. What's Abstract Summary?
Abstract Summary is a community to share the summary information generated by everyone and shared for everyone. It leverages AIGC technology to summarize the article 7/24. As a Chrome Extension user, you have the privilege to summarize any articles you want. As a common user, you can browse the summaries shared on website and read the summary list per domain to find your interest.

2. What's the AIGC?
AIGC is a cut-edge artificial technology trained with huge mount of human generated information and predict next words in completion. 

3. Could I skip the original article reading with the summary?
It depends, and we strong encourage you to read the original article if you find the summary is interested. The AIGC cannot guarantee everything is accurate and it may mislead people even on directions. 

Enjoy the taste before reading!
